name: ChatOptionsHelper
description: The ChatOptionsHelper class provides comprehensive control over Minecraft's chat display, formatting, and communication settings.
overview:
The ChatOptionsHelper class manages all chat and communication settings:
- Chat visibility - Control which messages appear in chat
- Visual customization - Opacity, size, spacing, and colors
- Link handling - Web link clickability and security prompts
- Accessibility features - Subtitles, narrator, and command suggestions
- Chat dimensions - Width, height, and layout configuration

methods.name: getChatVisibility
methods.description: Gets the current chat visibility mode.

methods.name: setChatVisibility
methods.description: Sets the chat visibility mode.

methods.name: areColorsShown
methods.description: Checks if color codes are allowed in chat.
examples:
const chat = JsMacros.getOptions().getChatOptions();
Chat.log(`Chat colors: ${chat.areColorsShown() ? 'Enabled' : 'Disabled'}`);

methods.name: setShowColors
methods.description: Enables or disables color codes in chat.

parameters.name: show
parameters.description: true to show color codes, false to disable

methods.name: areWebLinksEnabled
methods.description: Checks if web links in chat are clickable.
examples:
const chat = JsMacros.getOptions().getChatOptions();
Chat.log(`Web links: ${chat.areWebLinksEnabled() ? 'Clickable' : 'Not clickable'}`);

methods.name: enableWebLinks
methods.description: Enables or disables clickable web links in chat.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: true to enable clickable links, false to disable

methods.name: isWebLinkPromptEnabled
methods.description: Checks if web link warning prompts are enabled.
examples:
const chat = JsMacros.getOptions().getChatOptions();
Chat.log(`Link prompts: ${chat.isWebLinkPromptEnabled() ? 'Enabled' : 'Disabled'}`);

methods.name: enableWebLinkPrompt
methods.description: Enables or disables web link warning prompts.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: true to show link warnings, false to hide prompts

methods.name: getChatOpacity
methods.description: Gets the current chat window opacity.
examples:
const chat = JsMacros.getOptions().getChatOptions();
Chat.log(`Chat opacity: ${(chat.getChatOpacity() * 100).toFixed(0)}%`);

methods.name: setChatOpacity
methods.description: Sets the chat window opacity.

parameters.name: opacity
parameters.description: Opacity value (0.0 = fully transparent, 1.0 = fully opaque)
